properties.address: Cardonald Care Home, Glasgow, Lanarkshire G52 3AR
properties.description: Bordered by trees with the River Clyde nearby, you will find Cardonald Care Home situated on the outskirts of Glasgow. Close to great transport links, making the home easily accessible for guests to pop in for a visit. Our Care team offers residential care for those who need help with daily tasks, as well as residential dementia care where we support people to maintain their independence and individuality, encouraging social activity and building relationships within the home. We also provide nursing care for people with complex medical needs, and nursing dementia care, provided by expert teams skilled in the complexities of looking after those living with dementia, who may also have other long-term medical conditions. Inside, our home has refurbished lounge areas which are fantastic places for residents and their loved ones to spend quality time together. We also have a library where our residents love to lose themselves in their favourite book. Please do not hesitate to get in touch for further information. Please call the home manager on 0141 883 4131.
properties.title: Cardonald Care Home
